LUKE 14.20 jah sums qaþ:
qen liugaida jah duþe ni mag qiman.
LUKE 14.21 jah qimands sa skalks gataih fraujin seinamma þata.
þanuh þwairhs sa gardawaldands qaþ du skalka seinamma:
usgagg sprauto in gatwons jah staigos baurgs jah unledans jah gamaidans jah blindans jah haltans attiuh hidre.
LUKE 14.22 jah qaþ sa skalks:
frauja, warþ swe anabaust, jah nauh stads ist.
LUKE 14.23 jah qaþ sa frauja du þamma skalka:
usgagg and wigans jah faþos jah nauþei innatgaggan, ei usfulnai gards meins.
LUKE 14.24 qiþa allis izwis þatei ni ainshun manne jainaize þize faura haitanane kauseiþ þis nahtamatis meinis.
LUKE 14.25 miþiddjedun þan imma hiuhmans managai, jah gawandjands sik qaþ du im:
LUKE 14.26 jabai ƕas gaggiþ du mis jah ni fijaiþ attan seinana jah aiþein jah qen jah barna jah broþruns jah swistruns, nauh-uþ-þan seina silbins saiwala, ni mag meins siponeis wisan.
LUKE 14.27 jah saei ni bairiþ galgan seinana jah gaggai afar mis, ni mag wisan meins siponeis.
LUKE 14.28 izwara ƕas raihtis wiljands kelikn timbrjan, niu frumist gasitands rahneiþ manwiþo habaiu þo du ustiuhan;

LUKE 14.29 ibai aufto, biþe gasatidedi grunduwaddju jah ni mahtedi ustiuhan, allai þai gasaiƕandans duginnaina bilaikan ina, LUKE 14.30 qiþandans þatei sa manna dustodida timbrjan jah ni mahta ustiuhan.

LUKE 14.31 aiþþau ƕas þiudans gaggands stigqan wiþra anþarana þiudan du wigan ina, niu gasitands faurþis þankeiþ, siaiu mahteigs miþ taihun þusundjom gamotjan þamma miþ twaim tigum þusundjo gaggandin ana sik?
LUKE 14.32 aiþþau nauhþanuh fairra imma wisandin insandjands airu bidjiþ gawairþjis.
LUKE 14.33 swah nu ƕarjizuh izwara saei ni afqiþiþ allamma aigina seinamma, ni mag wisan meins siponeis.
LUKE 14.34 god salt;
iþ jabai salt baud wairþiþ, ƕe gasupoda?
LUKE 14.35 nih du airþai, ni du maihstau fagr ist;
ut uswairpand imma.
saei habai ausona hausjandona, gahausjai.
LUKE 15.1 Wesun-uþ-þan imma neƕjandans sik allai motarjos jah frawaurhtai hausjan imma.
LUKE 15.2 jah birodidedun Fareisaieis jah bokarjos, qiþandans þatei sa frawaurhtans andnimiþ jah miþmatjiþ im.
LUKE 15.3 qaþ þan du im þo gajukon qiþands:
LUKE 15.4 ƕas manna izwara aigands taihuntehund lambe jah fraliusands ainamma þize, niu bileiþiþ þo niuntehund jah niun ana auþidai jah gaggiþ afar þamma fralusanin, unte bigitiþ þata?
LUKE 15.5 Jah bigitands uslagjiþ ana amsans seinans faginonds, LUKE 15.6 jah qimands in garda galaþoþ frijonds jah garaznans qiþands du im:
faginoþ miþ mis þammei bigat lamb mein þata fralusano.
LUKE 15.7 qiþa izwis þatei swa faheds wairþiþ in himina in ainis frawaurhtis idreigondins þau in niuntehundis jah niune garaihtaize þaiei ni þaurbun idreigos.
LUKE 15.8 aiþþau suma qino drakmans habandei taihun, jabai fraliusiþ drakmin ainamma, niu tandeiþ lukarn jah usbaugeiþ razn jah sokeiþ glaggwaba, unte bigitiþ?
LUKE 15.9 jah bigitandei gahaitiþ frijondjos jah garaznons qiþandei:
faginoþ miþ mis, unte bigat drakman þammei fralaus.
LUKE 15.10 swa qiþa izwis, faheds wairþiþ in andwairþja aggele gudis in ainis idreigondins frawaurhtis.
LUKE 15.11 qaþ-uþ-þan:
manne sums aihta twans sununs.
LUKE 15.12 jah qaþ sa juhiza ize du attin:
atta, gif mis, sei undrinnai mik dail aiginis;
jah disdailida im swes sein.
LUKE 15.13 jah afar ni managans dagans brahta samana allata sa juhiza sunus jah aflaiþ in land fairra wisando jah jainar distahida þata swes seinata libands usstiuriba.
LUKE 15.14 biþe þan frawas allamma, warþ huhrus abrs and gawi jainata, jah is dugann alaþarba wairþan.
LUKE 15.15 jah gaggands gahaftida sik sumamma baurgjane jainis gaujis, jah insandida ina haiþjos seinaizos haldan sweina.
